Description:
The Workflow Command-line Compiler can be used for AWL bypass and is listed in Microsoft's recommended block rules.

Author: Christopher Peacock @SecurePeacock, SCYTHE @scythe_io
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Use of Wfc.exe
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where process_path like '%\wfc.exe' and original_file_name = 'wfc.exe'
